languages.text: "На этой инфопластине — мой журнал наблюдений за вами и членами вашей свиты. В ней я фиксирую привычки, особенности характера, заслуживающие внимания факты. И, если говорить о вашей персоне... не только их. Думаю, вы уже обнаружили там записи иного характера — размышления о том, как можно было бы оказать знак внимания Вольному Торговцу". {n}Взгляд из-под чуть опущенных бровей можно было бы счесть лукавым в исполнении менее сурового человека.{/n}

traits.locale_text: В этой книжке мои наблюдения. И... размышления, как сделать вам комплимент

languages.text: "The data-slate contains my observation log on you and the members of your retinue. I use it to record habits, personality traits, and noteworthy facts. And with regard to you in particular... more than that. I think you have already come across notes of a different nature — thoughts about how one might make overtures toward a Rogue Trader." {n}In a less stern man, the look the Proctor gives you from beneath his slightly lowered brows could be considered roguish.{/n}
languages.original_text: "На этой инфопластине — мой журнал наблюдений за вами и членами вашей свиты. В ней я фиксирую привычки, особенности характера, заслуживающие внимания факты. И, если говорить о вашей персоне... не только их. Думаю, вы уже обнаружили там записи иного характера — размышления о том, как можно было бы оказать знак внимания Вольному Торговцу". {n}Взгляд из-под чуть опущенных бровей можно было бы счесть лукавым в исполнении менее сурового человека.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The data-slate contains my observation log on you and the members of your retinue. I use it to record your habits, personality traits, and noteworthy facts. And with regard to you in particular... more than that. I think you have already come across notes of a different nature — musings about how a humble servant of the Lex Imperialis might make overtures toward a Rogue Trader." {n}In a less stern man, the look the Proctor gives you from beneath his slightly lowered brows could be considered roguish.{/n}

"The data-slate contains my observation log on you and the members of your retinue. I use it to record habits, personality traits, and noteworthy facts. And with regard to you in particular... more than that. I think you have already come across notes of a different nature — thoughts about how one might make overtures toward a Rogue Trader." {n}In a less stern man, the look the Proctor gives you from beneath his slightly lowered brows could be considered roguish.{/n}

languages.text: 「そのデータスレートには、あなたとあなたの従者たちに関する観察記録が入っています。習慣や性格的特徴、注目すべき事実などを記録するために使用しています。そして、特にあなたに関しては…それ以上のことも記しています。すでにあなたも、性質の異なるメモ─つまり、いかにローグトレーダーにアプローチするかについての思索を見つけたのではないでしょうか」{n}もし彼がもう少し柔らかい人物であれば、そのわずかに伏せられた眉の下からあなたを見つめる代理人の視線は、やや悪戯っぽいものと受け取っただろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The data-slate contains my observation log on you and the members of your retinue. I use it to record habits, personality traits, and noteworthy facts. And with regard to you in particular... more than that. I think you have already come across notes of a different nature — thoughts about how one might make overtures toward a Rogue Trader." {n}In a less stern man, the look the Proctor gives you from beneath his slightly lowered brows could be considered roguish.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そのデータスレートには、あなたとあなたの従者たちに関する観察記録が入っています。習慣や性格的特徴、注目すべき事実などを記録するために使用しています。そして、特にあなたに関しては…それ以上のことも記しています。すでにあなたも、性質の異なるメモ─つまり、レックス・インペリアの謙虚な僕が、いかにローグトレーダーにアプローチするかについての思索を見つけたのではないでしょうか」{n}もし彼がもう少し柔らかい人物であれば、そのわずかに伏せられた眉の下からあなたを見つめる代理人の視線は、やや悪戯っぽいものと受け取っただろう。{/n}

languages.text: "Der Datablock enthält mein Beobachtungslog über Euch und die Mitglieder Eures Gefolges. Ich zeichne damit Angewohnheiten, Persönlichkeitsmerkmale und relevante Fakten auf. Und was Euch im Speziellen angeht ... noch mehr. Ihr seid bestimmt auch schon auf Notizen anderer Art gestoßen – Gedanken darüber, wie man {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} Avancen machen könnte." {n}Bei einem weniger ernsthaften Mann könnte der Blick des Proktors unter seiner leicht gesenkten Stirn als verschlagen gedeutet werden.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The data-slate contains my observation log on you and the members of your retinue. I use it to record habits, personality traits, and noteworthy facts. And with regard to you in particular... more than that. I think you have already come across notes of a different nature — thoughts about how one might make overtures toward a Rogue Trader." {n}In a less stern man, the look the Proctor gives you from beneath his slightly lowered brows could be considered roguish.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Datablock enthält mein Beobachtungslog über Euch und die Mitglieder Eures Gefolges. Ich zeichne damit Angewohnheiten, Persönlichkeitsmerkmale und relevante Fakten auf. Und was Euch im Speziellen angeht ... noch mehr. Ihr seid bestimmt auch schon auf Notizen anderer Art gestoßen – Gedanken darüber, wie man {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} Avancen machen könnte." {n}Bei einem weniger ernsthaften Mann könnte der Blick des Proktors unter seiner leicht gesenkten Stirn als verschlagen gedeutet werden.{/n}

languages.text: « La plaque de données contient mon journal d'observations sur vous et les membres de votre entourage. Je m'en sers pour consigner vos habitudes, traits de personnalité et autres renseignements pertinents. Et en ce qui vous concerne... ce n'est pas tout. Vous avez déjà dû tomber sur des notes d'une tout autre nature ; des réflexions sur la manière dont quelqu'un pourrait déclarer sa flamme à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. » {n}Chez un homme moins austère, le regard que le proctor vous adresse par en dessous ses cils légèrement baissés pourrait passer pour de l'espièglerie.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The data-slate contains my observation log on you and the members of your retinue. I use it to record habits, personality traits, and noteworthy facts. And with regard to you in particular... more than that. I think you have already come across notes of a different nature — thoughts about how one might make overtures toward a Rogue Trader." {n}In a less stern man, the look the Proctor gives you from beneath his slightly lowered brows could be considered roguish.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « La plaque de données contient mon journal d'observations sur vous et les membres de votre entourage. Je m'en sers pour consigner vos habitudes, traits de personnalité et autres renseignements pertinents. Et en ce qui vous concerne... ce n'est pas tout. Vous avez déjà dû tomber sur des notes d'une tout autre nature ; des réflexions sur la manière dont quelqu'un pourrait déclarer sa flamme à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. » {n}Chez un homme moins austère, le regard que le proctor vous adresse par en dessous ses cils légèrement baissés pourrait passer pour de l'espièglerie.{/n}

languages.text: «La tablilla de datos contiene un listado de observaciones sobre usted y los miembros de su séquito. La uso para tomar nota de sus costumbres, rasgos de personalidad y otros datos de interés. Y en lo que respecta a usted, concretamente... ciertos detalles adicionales. Creo que ya se habrá topado con algunas notas de distinta índole: mis reflexiones sobre cómo uno podría insinuarse a {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente». {n}Si se tratase de un hombre menos estricto, la mirada ceñuda que te lanza el Procurador podría llegar a considerarse traviesa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The data-slate contains my observation log on you and the members of your retinue. I use it to record habits, personality traits, and noteworthy facts. And with regard to you in particular... more than that. I think you have already come across notes of a different nature — thoughts about how one might make overtures toward a Rogue Trader." {n}In a less stern man, the look the Proctor gives you from beneath his slightly lowered brows could be considered roguish.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «La tablilla de datos contiene un listado de observaciones sobre usted y los miembros de su séquito. La uso para tomar nota de sus costumbres, rasgos de personalidad y otros datos de interés. Y en lo que respecta a usted, concretamente... ciertos detalles adicionales. Creo que ya se habrá topado con algunas notas de distinta índole: mis reflexiones sobre cómo uno podría insinuarse a {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente». {n}Si se tratase de un hombre menos estricto, la mirada ceñuda que te lanza el Procurador podría llegar a considerarse traviesa.{/n}

languages.text: “这块数据板上记录着我对你和你的随行人员的观察记录。我会把所有值得留意的事情记在这里，包括每个人的习惯、个性特征等等，尤其是关于你的事情……远远不止这些。我猜测，你应该已经注意到了，部分内容的风格与其他部分截然不同，听起来像是在向行商浪人示好。”{n}索罗蒙眉毛微微下垂，看着你。如果不是因为他的性格过于严肃，他此刻的眼神可能会充满俏皮的意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The data-slate contains my observation log on you and the members of your retinue. I use it to record habits, personality traits, and noteworthy facts. And with regard to you in particular... more than that. I think you have already come across notes of a different nature — thoughts about how one might make overtures toward a Rogue Trader." {n}In a less stern man, the look the Proctor gives you from beneath his slightly lowered brows could be considered roguish.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这块数据板上记录着我对你和你的随行人员的观察记录。我会把所有值得留意的事情记在这里，包括每个人的习惯、个性特征等等，尤其是关于你的事情……远远不止这些。我猜测，你应该已经注意到了，部分内容的风格与其他部分截然不同，听起来像是在向行商浪人示好。”{n}索罗蒙眉毛微微下垂，看着你。如果不是因为他的性格过于严肃，他此刻的眼神可能会充满俏皮的意味。{/n}

languages.text: "Bu databelada sizinle maiyetinizin her bir ferdi hakkında tuttuğum müşahede defterim mevcut. Âdet, huy, dikkatimi celbeden hususları not ederim. Bilhassa sizinle alakalı olarak da bundan fazlasını not etmişimdir. Sanırım farklı yapıdaki notlarıma, bir Hür Tacir'e nasıl yaklaşabileceğine dair düşüncelerime zaten rastlamışsınızdır." {n}Haşin olmayan biri, Üsteğmen'in hafifçe indirdiği kaşlarının altından attığı bu bakışı cilve olarak değerlendirebilirdi.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The data-slate contains my observation log on you and the members of your retinue. I use it to record habits, personality traits, and noteworthy facts. And with regard to you in particular... more than that. I think you have already come across notes of a different nature — thoughts about how one might make overtures toward a Rogue Trader." {n}In a less stern man, the look the Proctor gives you from beneath his slightly lowered brows could be considered roguish.{/n}
